name: Satrio Underworld (Diffran Nur Cahyo)
description:
Satrio Underworld is a game made for entertainment. This game is entitled "Satrio Underworld". This game is a platformer type where this game must pass or fight several enemies, avoid traps, and also have to fight bosses when they have passed or fought several enemies and passed the enemy. This game is also required to collect a coin scattered in the game area. The source and code of this game is open source. Anyone is allowed to study it.

The synopsis of this game is as follows:

A little boy was raised by a demon from the underworld. But the demon nation didn't accept the little boy because he was a human. Humans are not allowed to be in the underworld. Yet someone insisted on educating and raising him. He was shunned and exiled from the population. The little boy grew up to be a young man and lived with his teacher. One day he finds out about the upper world and is interested in going there. But his teacher did not allow it, but he insisted to go. When he returned, the teacher was gone, all that was left was a trace of blood.
